text.div: CapabilityStatement for Patient Identity Subscriber Actor in the IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement Patient Master Identity Registry (PMIR). The IHE PMIR Profile text is Normative, this conformance resource is Informative.

title.value: IHE ITI Patient Master Identity Registry (PMIR) - Patient Identity Subscriber (client)

description.value: CapabilityStatement for Patient Identity Subscriber Actor in the IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement IHE PMIR. See .https://wiki.ihe.net/index.php/Patient_Master_Identity_Registry_(PMIR) The IHE PMIR Profile text is Normative, this conformance resource is Informative.

documentation.value: PMIR client provides capability to create, read, update, and delete Subscription resources.

description.value: None mandated by IHE, encouraged IHE-IUA or SMART-on-FHIR
